sentences.sentence: He was stereotyped by some as a renegade.
sentences.translation: 他被一些人带着成见视为一名叛逆者。

sentences.sentence: He has shown himself to be a renegade without respect for the rule of law.
sentences.translation: 他已经表现出自己是个毫不尊重法规的叛逆者。

sentences.sentence: When he was doing underground work he was arrested because a renegade informed against him.
sentences.translation: 他做地下工作时， 曾因叛徒告密而被捕。
